title: Dinosaurs Love Underpants
description: The hilarious follow-up to the award-winning Aliens Love Underpants!The mystery of dinosaur extinction is solved! Scientists have plenty of theories about why dinosaurs are extinct, but the UK’s bestselling author/illustrator team of Claire Freedman and Ben Cort knows the real The dinos were wiped out in an Underpants War! This wacky celebration of underpants is perfect for reading aloud, and the hilarious antics of T. rex and the gang are endlessly entertaining. Featuring fun, vibrant art and short, rhyming text,  Dinosaurs Love Underpants  is a prehistoric pleasure parents and kids will want to read again and again.Praise for  Dinosaurs Love 'Fans of Aliens Wear Underpants will revel in this companion volume's dotty humor and pell-mell action'  Publisher's Weekly'A wild and wonderful rhyme by one of the funniest authors on the planet.'  Scholastic Kids Book Club
author: Ben Cort
